title: The Shadow Jungler Returns... Shen Jungle Patch 5.22

embed.description: Playing my best character in LoL. Shen is one hell of an OP jungler these days after the latest patch. You can also find on twitter @ https://twitter.com/shaunofdasheep And credit for the soundtrack goes to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DhCp22tIiTc

body: Playing my best character in LoL.  Shen is one hell of an OP jungler these days after the latest patch.

replies.body: no he isnt....what goes on in your mind to prompt you to say something so ignorant? shen jungle op he reckons......
Shen is a god, don;t deny it.  He wins at everything.  Even ADC!!!

Shen is a good _anything_ nowadays, along with Rammus.

You won't find super powerful magic damage dealers without having at least some main form of physical damage, even in mid because that's dominated by assassins and ADCs, so good luck countering armour tanks.
